Sustainability  
Overview
Sustainability can mean very different things to  
different people   At Stericycle, we take a multi-faceted 
view  Our definition includes a deep sense of  
corporate responsibility and accountability across  
a broad spectrum of commitments, beginning  
with protecting the environment   
Our definition also includes taking care of our people 
through better safety, employee engagement, and 
career development to ensure a sustainable workforce   It 
involves civic mindedness and making a difference in the 
communities where we work and live   Finally, it includes a 
commitment to profitability so we can sustain our efforts   
 
We protect what matters.
